column5: I have had these fine folks do prop repair work for me on a couple of occasions.  The work has always been top notch.  I recently tried to contact them and the number is coming up as unassigned.  Anyone know what happened to them?
Their still there as far as i know.  905 612 8040

Their still there as far as i know. 905 612 8040  What # are you trying because 2 different ones come up doing a search. The other one that comes up is 905-677-0316  Let me know what one you get through on as I need to drop in and see them next month when I'm visiting.
The one on his business card. The two online don't work.  My friend works near the place so he stopped in to grab his info as i needed to get my skeg repaired.

The one on his business card. The two online don't work. My friend works near the place so he stopped in to grab his info as i needed to get my skeg repaired.  Dan the one you posted is one of the two that come up in a search.

Ok, well previously the one i found online didnt work. This was like 6 months ago. I did mention that to him as i had a difficult time getting a hold of him. If im not mistaken,  at that time their was just one number that came up with a quick google search
Thanks everyone.  The 905-612-8040 number worked.  All the online listings I found pointed to the 0316 number, that one no longer works.  Good to see that they are still in business.
Good to know. I have a couple of props that need some work.
I have one prop needs repairing,part of a trade in,he is fair,and as said does awesome work including re-pitching your currant prop if needed.
Yep. I have been dealing with them since the early 90's. Going to get them to fix a couple of dinged props and re-pitch the High5 stainless prop I got for a song this summer.
I love this place have been going for years top notch sent alot of people there
